extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Support for Firmware Package
extracted_playbook.description: Contact your support representative to obtain the firmware package that resolves the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware to the version provided by the support representative to mitigate the vulnerability.
